  • 2007-10-03 10:04:44

    Re: Error Table AT_messages_sent creation failed

    Hi,
    The problem is mysql uses a different syntax before 4.0.18

    Can you try the following:

    Open atutor/install/db/atutor_schema.sql

    Go to line 595, change
    ") ENGINE = MYISAM;"
    to
    ) TYPE = MYISAM;


  • 2007-10-04 06:17:54

    Re: Error Table AT_messages_sent creation failed

    Harris,
    Thank you that worked !! I'm installed and now I will test it out today. Thanks again.
    Steve
